requirement_tested: Display a list of service plans with detailed information
user_persona: A potential customer browsing for a new phone plan.
user_goal: View all available service plans with their detailed features.

narrative_steps.title: Landing on Service Plans Page
narrative_steps.description: Sarah visits the phone operator's website and clicks on 'Service Plans' from the navigation menu to explore options.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'Service Plans' link in the navigation bar.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The service plans page loads, displaying a list of plan cards with names, prices, and basic features.

narrative_steps.title: Expanding Plan Details
narrative_steps.description: Interested in a specific plan, Sarah clicks on one of the plan cards to see more information.
narrative_steps.action: Click on a service plan card.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The selected card expands to show detailed information including data limit, call minutes, SMS count, and additional features.

requirement_tested: Provide an online customer support tool with live chat or ticketing system
user_persona: An existing customer needing assistance with billing.
user_goal: Get help with a billing issue through either live chat or submitting a support ticket.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Support Section
narrative_steps.description: John logs into his account and navigates to the Support section where he sees options for Live Chat and Submit Ticket.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'Support' link in the navigation menu.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The support interface loads with two tabs: 'Live Chat' and 'Submit Ticket'.

narrative_steps.title: Submitting a Support Ticket
narrative_steps.description: Since no agents are available for chat, John decides to submit a ticket instead.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'Submit Ticket' tab, fill in the subject and message, then click 'Submit'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The ticket form is submitted successfully, and John receives confirmation that his request has been received.

requirement_tested: Enable users to browse and filter available service plans
user_persona: A budget-conscious customer looking for affordable plans.
user_goal: Find the most economical service plan based on price.

narrative_steps.title: Opening Filter Options
narrative_steps.description: Emma visits the service plans page and wants to sort by price. She clicks the filter dropdown button.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the filter dropdown button above the service plans list.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A menu with sorting and filtering options appears below the dropdown button.

narrative_steps.title: Applying Price Filter
narrative_steps.description: Emma selects 'Price Low to High' to see the cheapest plans first.
narrative_steps.action: Select 'Price Low to High' from the filter menu.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The service plans list refreshes and displays plans sorted from lowest to highest price.

requirement_tested: Implement account management functionality for users to update their information
user_persona: A registered user who recently moved and needs to update contact details.
user_goal: Update personal information in the account settings.

narrative_steps.title: Navigating to Account Management
narrative_steps.description: Michael logs in and goes to his account page to update his address after moving.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'Account' link in the navigation menu.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The account management form loads with Michael's current information pre-filled in the fields.

narrative_steps.title: Updating Personal Information
narrative_steps.description: Michael modifies his address field and saves the changes.
narrative_steps.action: Change the address field value and click the 'Save' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The form data is validated and sent to the backend. Michael sees a success message confirming the update.

requirement_tested: Allow users to access and view their personal details securely
user_persona: A security-conscious user checking stored personal information.
user_goal: Verify that personal account details are displayed correctly and securely.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Profile Page
narrative_steps.description: Sophia logs in and wants to review her profile information to ensure accuracy.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to the account section and view the profile page.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The profile page displays Sophia's full name, email, phone number, and address in a read-only format.

narrative_steps.title: Editing Profile Information
narrative_steps.description: Noticing an outdated phone number, Sophia clicks to edit her profile.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Edit Profile' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Sophia is redirected to the account management form where she can update her information.

requirement_tested: Use light goldenrod as the background color for the website body
user_persona: A visually-oriented user evaluating the website's design consistency.
user_goal: Confirm that the website uses light goldenrod as the background color throughout.

narrative_steps.title: Checking Homepage Background
narrative_steps.description: Alex visits the homepage and observes the overall color scheme.
narrative_steps.action: Load the homepage URL.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The entire body of the page has a light goldenrod (#FAFAD2) background color.

narrative_steps.title: Verifying Consistency Across Pages
narrative_steps.description: Alex navigates to other sections to ensure consistent background color usage.
narrative_steps.action: Visit multiple pages including Service Plans, Support, and Account.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Every visited page maintains the same light goldenrod background color.

requirement_tested: Apply olive drab as the primary color for main UI components
user_persona: A UI/UX designer reviewing the website's visual design.
user_goal: Validate that olive drab is consistently used for primary UI components.

narrative_steps.title: Inspecting Navigation Elements
narrative_steps.description: Taylor examines the navigation bar to verify primary color usage.
narrative_steps.action: Load any page and inspect the navigation bar styling.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Navigation elements including active links and hover states use olive drab (#6B8E23) as the primary color.

narrative_steps.title: Checking Interactive Components
narrative_steps.description: Taylor looks at buttons and form elements across different sections.
narrative_steps.action: Visit various pages and inspect buttons, form inputs, and headers.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: All primary interactive components consistently use olive drab as their main color.

requirement_tested: Create a responsive layout compatible with desktop and mobile devices
user_persona: A mobile user accessing the website on a smartphone.
user_goal: Successfully navigate and interact with the website on a small screen device.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Website on Mobile
narrative_steps.description: Jordan opens the website on his smartphone and checks the layout adaptation.
narrative_steps.action: Load the website URL on a mobile device or resize browser to mobile width.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The layout adjusts to a mobile-friendly format with stacked elements and a transformed navigation menu.

narrative_steps.title: Interacting with Mobile Layout
narrative_steps.description: Jordan interacts with components to ensure they function properly on mobile.
narrative_steps.action: Click through navigation items and interact with forms/buttons.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: All interactive elements are accessible and usable on the mobile screen with appropriate touch targets.

requirement_tested: Include navigation menu with links to service plans, support, and account sections
user_persona: A new visitor exploring the website for the first time.
user_goal: Easily find and navigate to different sections of the website using the main menu.

narrative_steps.title: Locating Navigation Menu
narrative_steps.description: Morgan lands on the homepage and looks for ways to explore the site.
narrative_steps.action: Look at the top of the page for navigation elements.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A horizontal navigation bar is visible with links for 'Service Plans', 'Support', and 'Account'.

narrative_steps.title: Navigating Between Sections
narrative_steps.description: Morgan clicks through the menu items to visit each main section.
narrative_steps.action: Click on each navigation link: 'Service Plans', 'Support', and 'Account'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Each click successfully loads the corresponding section page, with the active link highlighted.

requirement_tested: Integrate user authentication for secure access to account features
user_persona: A registered user wanting to access personalized account features.
user_goal: Log into the account and access protected features securely.

narrative_steps.title: Initiating Login Process
narrative_steps.description: Casey wants to access her account dashboard and clicks the login button.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'Login' button in the navigation menu.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A login form appears with fields for email and password.

narrative_steps.title: Authenticating and Accessing Account
narrative_steps.description: Casey enters her credentials and submits the form to log in.
narrative_steps.action: Enter valid email and password, then click the 'Submit' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Casey is successfully authenticated and redirected to her account dashboard with personalized content.

requirement_tested: Design a contact form or help request submission interface
user_persona: A visitor seeking general information before signing up.
user_goal: Submit a help request through the contact form without having an account.

narrative_steps.title: Finding Contact Form
narrative_steps.description: Riley has questions about service plans and finds the contact form in the support section.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to the Support page and locate the contact form.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A contact form with fields for name, email, subject, and message is visible.

narrative_steps.title: Submitting Help Request
narrative_steps.description: Riley fills out the form with his inquiry and submits it.
narrative_steps.action: Fill in all required fields and click the 'Submit' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The form is successfully submitted, and Riley receives a confirmation message.

requirement_tested: Ensure all dynamic data is fetched from backend APIs without mock data
user_persona: A quality assurance tester validating data sources.
user_goal: Verify that service plan information comes from live API calls, not static data.

narrative_steps.title: Loading Service Plans
narrative_steps.description: Dana visits the service plans page to check if data is loaded dynamically.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to the service plans page.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A loading indicator appears briefly before the service plans are displayed, indicating API data fetching.

narrative_steps.title: Confirming Dynamic Data Source
narrative_steps.description: Dana inspects network activity to confirm API usage.
narrative_steps.action: Open browser developer tools and monitor network requests when page loads.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Network tab shows API calls to '/api/service-plans' endpoint fetching actual data.

requirement_tested: Set up backend API endpoints connected to PostgreSQL using provided environment variables
user_persona: A backend developer verifying database connectivity.
user_goal: Confirm that the backend successfully connects to PostgreSQL with correct configuration.

narrative_steps.title: Starting Backend Server
narrative_steps.description: Devon starts the backend server to check database connection initialization.
narrative_steps.action: Run the backend server with configured environment variables.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Server starts successfully and establishes connection to PostgreSQL database without errors.

narrative_steps.title: Testing Database Operations
narrative_steps.description: Devon makes API requests that involve database operations.
narrative_steps.action: Make a GET request to '/api/service-plans' endpoint.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: API returns data retrieved from the PostgreSQL database, confirming successful integration.

requirement_tested: Configure package.json scripts for concurrent frontend and backend development startup
user_persona: A developer setting up the project for local development.
user_goal: Start both frontend and backend servers simultaneously using npm scripts.

narrative_steps.title: Installing Dependencies
narrative_steps.description: Alex sets up the project for the first time and needs to install all dependencies.
narrative_steps.action: Run 'npm run install:all' command in the root directory.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Dependencies for both frontend and backend projects are installed concurrently without errors.

narrative_steps.title: Starting Development Servers
narrative_steps.description: After installation, Alex wants to start both development servers together.
narrative_steps.action: Run 'npm run dev' command in the root directory.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Both frontend and backend development servers start concurrently and are accessible.

requirement_tested: Support real-time updates for customer support interactions if applicable
user_persona: A customer engaged in a live chat support session.
user_goal: Receive immediate responses from support agents during a chat session.

narrative_steps.title: Initiating Live Chat Session
narrative_steps.description: Taylor logs in and opens a live chat session with customer support.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to Support section and switch to the 'Live Chat' tab.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: WebSocket connection is established and chat interface is ready for messaging.

narrative_steps.title: Receiving Real-Time Messages
narrative_steps.description: While waiting, Taylor receives an instant greeting from a support agent.
narrative_steps.action: Wait for incoming message from support agent.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Agent's message appears immediately in the chat history without page refresh.
